description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k)=GCD(C(n,k),C(n,k-1)), n >= 1, 1<=k<=n.
comments: Equivalently, table T(n,k)=gcd(n,k)*(n+k-1)!/(n!*k!) read by antidiagonals. - _Michael Somos_, Jul 19 2002
references: H. Gupta, On a problem in parity, Indian J. Math., 11 (1969), 157-163. MR0260659
formula: a(2n, n)=n-th Catalan number; see A000108.Also T(n, k)=GCD(C(n, k), C(n+1, k)).
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Offset set to 1 by _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 21 2010
